data.name: Meow Defence
data.detailed_description:
Bricks are about to pile up on the surface of the Meow Star. You will drive U.S.S. Toilet Paper to rescue cats.
Smash all kinds of bricks, obtain resources, upgrade weapons and buildings,
Defeat the sudden powerful boss and escape with cats.
Cats don't know their situation. If they do something stupid, please forgive them.

Roguelike game core, random weapons and upgrade options, different builds bring different combat experiences.
It can be played with only one mouse without too fast reaction,
Different bricks need different tactics, adjust your build to meet various challenges.

The current game includes:
Weapons: 8
Building: 13
Upgrade: 5
Cat: 1
Spacecraft: 1
Level: 1
Achievements: 10

More content will be added in the future, please look forward to it.

data.short_description: You will drive a spaceship, smash the bricks surrounding the Meow star, and rescue the trapped cats

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Window 10 64bit
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 3000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Gtx 1050
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
